error.message: Parameter $query_factory of method Drupal\media_feeds\Feeds\Target\MediaTarget::__construct() has typehint with deprecated class Drupal\Core\Entity\Query\QueryFactory. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getQuery() or \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityStorageInterface::getAggregateQuery() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to media_feeds.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.

The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement compatible with Drupal 9.
